abstract: The Reader's Digest Association is parting with Every Day with Rachael Ray and will focus on what it calls its master brands.
snippet: The Reader's Digest Association is parting with Every Day with Rachael Ray and will focus on what it calls its master brands.
lead_paragraph: The Meredith Corporation, the publisher of Better Homes and Gardens, More and Family Circle, announced Wednesday that it had reached an agreement to purchase Every Day with Rachael Ray magazine and its related digital assets from the Reader's Digest Association.
